item.title: Hello Go Jetson Nano
item.description: We are going to run an Golang binary in Jetson nano. First write a simple go program. package main import "fmt" func main() { fmt.Println("Hello Jetson Nano!") } Compile for arm64 on linux. If your platform is different, use below list to figure it out. go tool dist list | grep arm android/arm android/arm64 darwin/arm64 freebsd/arm freebsd/arm64 ios/arm64 linux/arm linux/arm64 netbsd/arm netbsd/arm64 openbsd/arm openbsd/arm64 plan9/arm windows/arm windows/arm64 In Jetsons case it linux/arm64
